dct_title_s: A topographical map of Hudsons River : with the channels depth of water, rocks, shoals &c. and the country adjacent, from Sandy-Hook, New York and bay to Fort Edward, also the communication with Canada by Lake George and Lake Champlain, as high as Fort Chambly on Sorel River
dct_description_sm: Map in three sections. Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings.
dct_subject_sm: Hudson River (N.Y. and N.J.)—Maps—Early works to 1800
Richelieu River (N.Y. and Vt.-Québec)—Maps—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: Hudson River (N.Y. and N.J.)—Maps—Early works to 1800
